objects.text:
• ENERGYRODS 2.0 for propulsive feel
• LIGHTSTRIKE PRO cushioning
• Continental™ Rubber outsole

product_details.description: The Boston Marathon is a race. But it's also a goal, and a training plan and all the days it stays on your mind before the big one. The Adizero Boston 12 Shoes are built for mid- to long-distance running. They bring a race-day feel to training with a propulsive feel that comes from the glass-fiber infused ENERGYRODS 2.0, which limit energy loss underfoot. They're fast, but that does not come at the cost of durability - the midsole layers ultra-light LIGHTSTRIKE PRO cushioning with a new version of durable LIGHTSTRIKE 2.0 EVA. Continental Rubber outsole ENERGYRODS 2.0 limit energy loss Imported Sole material - Rubber ** Closure type - Lace-Up **

banner_details:
This banner design showcases a high-performance sports shoe with a modern, tech-inspired aesthetic. The left side of the banner features a dark blue gradient background with subtle horizontal lines giving a structured feel. The text layers include a bold heading (`heading`), an energetic subheading (`tagline`) in a bright orange tone, and a concise feature description (`description`) in white. The price (`price`) is prominently highlighted using a futuristic font in vibrant orange. A bright orange call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) stands out near the bottom. The right side displays the product image (`product_image`) on a light background, creating a clean contrast.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Blue Gradient: #1E2B3A to #273B52
- Accent Orange: #FF9500
- Bright Coral: #FF5E3A
- Soft White: #F5F5F5
- Text White: #FFFFFF
product_color: This product image features a modern running shoe with a dynamic and vibrant color palette. The base color is a soft beige (#E8E3D8), which provides a neutral canvas. Bold black (#2E2E2E) Adidas stripes stand out prominently across the mesh body, offering a strong visual anchor. The midsole incorporates a gradient blend of vivid sunset hues—bright orange (#FF5C30), fiery red (#FF3B30), and yellow (#FFD142)—which transitions smoothly, drawing attention and creating a sense of movement. White (#FFFFFF) elements on the sole and lace area add contrast and balance. This palette evokes energy and speed, ideally suited for an athletic-themed advertisement banner.
